hotel.name: Metropol Palace
hotel.description: Metropol Palace, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Belgrade features elegantly decorated accommodations with free WiFi, 1 rooftop restaurant and a lobby bar, just 400 m from the heart of Belgrade. It was renovated in 2012 and has a spa area with a 23 m pool.

hotel.name: Hotel N
hotel.description: Set just a 10-minute drive from the centre of Belgrade, Hotel N features a bar and free WiFi. The hotel's Atrium Restaurant serves local delicacies, and also offers halal dishes.All rooms include a TV with cable channels, as well as a private bathroom. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax.You can enjoy the aperitif bar behind the reception area with coffee while reading the papers and listening to quiet music.

hotel.name: Hotel Stadion
hotel.description: Located in the Zemun district of Belgrade, Hotel Stadion offers an a la carte restaurant. Free Wi-Fi access is available. All rooms are air-conditioned and come with a seating area and cable TV. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with free toiletries and towels.
